divs: Sighting DetailsI was a passenger in a vehicle getting driven southbound onto the Q-Bridge, from North Haven. I was looking around on the partly cloudy day, and noticed a green light. It stayed briefly and then moved VERY fast behind clouds. It wasn't a reflection or anything of the sort, and it was too small to be a plane. I was shocked, and assumed it was a UFO... I still have no explanation for it.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in New Haven
There were no other sightings in New Haven on or around March 8th 2006
